column2: Use Thaumaturgy to Bind the target and force them to owe you a favor.  They will not like this.  This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.

Use Thaumaturgy to make every action that involves paperwork terribly ineffective for the target as delays, problems, and miscommunications happen.  This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.

Use Thaumaturgy to make the target appear as the enemy of anyone who meets them.  They may overcome this problem but it will hamper their interactions with others.  This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.
Use Thaumaturgy to weaken and atrophy the target's physical attributes. This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.
Use Thaumaturgy to curse the target with incompetence.  Everything seems difficult and their failures are copious.  This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.
Use Thaumaturgy to enflame your weapon, causing aggravated damage in combat. This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.
Use Thaumaturgy to create a Bone of Lies.  The bone will allow you to detect lies spoken in your presence.  This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.
Use Thaumaturgy to create a Homunculus.  It serves as a lab assistant and minor helper.  This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.
Use Thaumaturgy to enspell your court room and force those within to speak the truth as they know it.  This will raise your blood thirst.  You may conduct a ritual once every 3 years.
